attributes.review: This app is horrible. It would not download. After multiple tries when it finally did, it crashes every time I open it. From other reviews I’ve read about what the app shows and does when opened, apparently I’m lucky mine keeps crashing!!
attributes.title: Terrible App

attributes.review: When u downloaded the app it worked fine and then my phone wasn’t working. It glitched and nothing worked anymore. All my files and photos were erased and I had to buy a new phone. On top of that, the information from this app is false and not accurate.❤️🧚‍♀️💫⭐️😚
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: if tiktok goes, this app goes. gen-z won’t stop. christians need this app, i rely on it to help with my relationship with the Lord. what am i going to do without it? this is just selfish of you to delete tiktok because your rally didn’t go as you wanted it to. i do not intend ANY hate towards you, but i need tiktok. thank you for your time!
attributes.title: honestly..

attributes.review: Don't ever download this app! After I download my entire phone screen turned orange and started to shake violently, then it wiped my phone completely. All I wanted to do was to support my totally and 100% non-racist non-homophobic president, but after 52 weeks of downloading the app completely broke my phone. Sad times       😔🤟🏻
attributes.title: why????

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what I could do to help this man and upon downloading it asked me information I want comfortable giving such as my name, gender, and thoughts on civil liberties such as BLM, Reproductive Rights for women, and my thoughts on ICE. I felt targeted and if I didn’t give them the answer they wanted I would be at risk. 0/10 recommend.
attributes.title: Just awful

attributes.review: This app took almost a WEEK to download and when it finally did It look all the information from my phone and wiped it all out. This app also has horrible quality and I have to click buttons several times for them to work. This app in terrible
attributes.title: 😤😤THIS IS TERRIBLE😤😤

attributes.review: I normally don’t go out of my way to leave reviews, but this app is just HORRIBLE. The best possible way I could describe this app is that it’s beyond poorly developed, I don’t think there’s any way of fixing it, the app should just delete itself off the surface of the internet. I mean there’s a reason why it’s rated at 1 star.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!

attributes.review: DONT GET THIS APP! after i downloaded it it hacked into my phone and collected all my information. i got a text that said "i know where you live and i see you". they then sent me a picture of my house. they said i have a cute dog. i got up to lock my doors and i found my dog dead on my porch😩 1/10 experience
attributes.title: r.i.p princess🕊💗 fly high

attributes.review: This app is horrible it took at least a week to download then hacked my phone made me vote for trump then asked me how much for my 10 year old son who was behind playing with his toy trucks. This app puts me and my family in danger. Download this app if you want your child/children to get kidnapped by president trump.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: WHAT!!! WHY DID I DOWNLOAD THIS APP ONLY FOR IT TO MAKE ME WAIT  a week for it to install!!!!!!!! every time i open the app, it crashes and will not let me in. why!!! i hate it. please DELETE THE APP! 😾😾😐‼️i am so beyond angry right now. finally when i am able to enter the app, it asks me for all of my personal information and i feel like i am being watched right now. stop.
attributes.title: ZERO STARS!!!
